events.title: Vinyl Night
events.description: Join us every Monday for an intentional listening experience. Share your favorite tunes and discover new music while enjoying house-made beer and snacks. Bring in a record from your collection and in exchange, we will play it for the pub and give you a free beer to sip on while you sit back and listen.

events.title: Music Night
events.description: In collaboration with Stir Fry Sessions, a Denver based artist collective, we showcase local talent while offering a community space to dance and mingle.

events.title: Game Night
events.description: Monday Nights from 5pm-10pm. Free Fries and Happy Hour prices for all game tables!

events.title: The Bluegrass Pick
events.description: The Bluegrass Pick is back, hosted by Max Kabat of Bowregard! Join us every Thursday from 7:30pm – 9:30pm for free live music, toe-tappin' energy, and the cozy pub vibe you already love.

events.title: Live Music
events.description: Join us every Friday night for live music at Mountain Sun Pub on Pearl Street.

events.title: Roaring 20's New Year's Eve Party- Tickets Required
events.description: <p>Celebrate New Year’s Eve in Roaring 20s elegance at St Julien with live entertainment, a premium bar, tray-passed bites and champagne toast! events.description: Lively conversation for language learners, native speakers, and everyone in between. We regularly have 10+ languages spoken and always have spirited discussions!

events.title: Trident Author Series: Christina Rivera - My Oceans
events.description: MY OCEANSAn urgent exploration of caring & mothering on a planet in crisisIn a swell of sea-linked essays, Christina Rivera explores the kinship between marine animals, humans, and Earth’s blue womb. Rivera’s investigative questions begin with the toxic burden of her body and spiral out—to a grievin...

events.title: Foxes Float Trip
events.description: Foxes Float Trip is a jammy folk-punk trio led by Carly Fox, with Rex Weston on the cello and Steve Fox on percussion, bringing the haunted farmers market vibes through Carly’s songs about hopes, dreams, ghosts, and all the middle aged things ️

events.title: Climatique
events.description: Boundless in Creation: A Climatique Music & Arts Gathering space for BIPOC, AFAB (assigned female at birth), and LGBTQIA+ artists to share, discuss, and uplift each other. We will showcase local talent, engage in a round-table discussion about our experiences with marginalization, explore strategies...

events.title: Mercy Club / Katie Mintle / Trouble's Braids
events.description: Boulder County's own boisterous folk rock band Mercy Club is back at the Trident! Anchored in family harmony, singable melodies and accessible, honest lyrics, Mercy Club is a dynamic folk ensemble with a rock n' roll heart.

events.title: Thomas Dow
events.description: Come enjoy some Colorado original, soulful, folk and blues music by Thomas! Some tasty covers available as well!

events.title: Andy Eppler w/McCormick
events.description: Folk, soul, blues and rockin’ powerful vocals from this local singer-songwriter, Andy Eppler. Guitarist, Matt McCormick will be joining us as an opener from 5:30-6:00pm.

events.title: Jake Edmoundson
events.description: Guitars, cadillacs, and hillbilly music from this singer/songwriter based in Lyons, CO

events.title: 3rd Annual AudioMedz Before the Ball Drops
events.description: Celebrate early with us on New Year's Eve with AudioMedz! Dance the night away and enjoy some great food and drinks!

events.title: Sugar Britches
events.description: Sugar Britches are a blend of mischievous and witty lyricists with eclectic and talented musicians from genres such as bluegrass, folk, rock and honky tonk.

events.title: Asteria Jazz Collective
events.description: Asteria Jazz Collective is a dynamic ensemble led by the captivating vocalist Stephany Prodromos and masterful bassist and musical director John Sleet Johnson.

events.title: Main St Laughs- free Comedy at Bricks on Main
events.description: 2nd free comedy show organized by up and comer Kristian Velando! First show was a full crowd and lots of laughs so come check out this new monthly series and support local comedians! (Mostly clean comedy, could be some language but we try for mostly PG and relatable content)

events.title: AoxomoxoA @ the stage at Bricks
events.description: AoxomoxoA is a Boulder County based band that plays music from the Grateful Dead universe. With strong vocals, creative interpretations, and the love of all things Grateful Dead, AoxomoxoA plays all over the Front Range region and puts on a professional and fan friendly show!

events.title: Joe Cool Band
events.description: The “Joe Cool Band” is a 6 piece high energy variety dance band that will “ROCK” your event.  Our goal is simple, to give you a night to remember, a celebration filled with fun, laughter, family and friends, GREAT MUSIC and a PACKED DANCE FLOOR.

events.title: Jay Stott Band
events.description: While playing the I25 corridor from Colorado to Montana for over 10 years, Lyons based Americana artist Jay Stott has been a finalist in songwriting competitions in Texas, Colorado and Montana, and performed at Rail on the River and Boulder’s Big Hootenanny this year.

events.title: The M.O.B. (Mike Ortiz Band)
events.description: The M.O.B. plays what you want to hear! From Allmans to ZZ Top with some Motown, Funk, Country and Blues tossed in.

events.title: Crick Wooder
events.description: An Owsley-Grade Grateful Dead Experience.

events.title: Minstrel in the Galaxy
events.description: Trio made up of Kenny Peralez, Thomas Gronberg and Dan Crecco always bring an amazing show.  Come hang out for a bit, you never know until you know!

events.title: John McKay Band
events.description: Longmont local.. come on out for an enjoyable night of music with no cover. Food and bar menu www.misskrissys.com

events.title: The Delta Sonics
events.description: The Delta Sonics music takes a Chicago Blues base and seasons it with Swing, Delta, N’awlins R&B and some early Rock n' Roll . This hard -working band averages over 200 shows a year. They have been featured at many of the major festivals in Colorado.

events.title: Boogie River
events.description: Blending tight grooves, infectious energy, and a mix of rock, funk, and soul, Boogie River delivers a sound that’s both nostalgic and fresh. With each member bringing years of experience from their previous bands, the result is a powerhouse of musicianship, creativity, and pure fun.

events.title: New Years Eve Party with Riley J Band, Cabaret & Vinyl DJs
events.description: Soulful live music, electrifying burlesque, vinyl DJs & midnight magic! The ultimate New Year's Eve celebration. Tickets selling fast!

events.title: RMP's Monthly Jazz, Soul, and Groove Jam Sessions
events.description: RMP Monthly Jam: Musicians unite for collaborative jazz, soul & groove performance. Pro artists create dynamic musical fusion. Free Event!

events.title: Big Ol' Pig Birthday Bash ft. Young and Dead - Jam Band Jubilee
events.description: Celebrate Ian Arras' birthday with Big Ol' Pig & Young and Dead! Colorado jam bands deliver funk, fusion & Grateful Dead grooves.

events.title: Blessing Bled Chimanga - Light & Hope: live album recording
events.description: Come and be part of this historic live recording!  Your screams, your voices, dancing, and  joy will shape the sound of this album.

events.title: Honeycomb Open Sing with Fox Linnea Drickey - Joyful Community Harmony
events.description: Join Fox Linnea Drickey for community singing! Learn folk & roots songs by ear, layer harmonies, and sing together in joy. All welcome!

events.title: J.J. Murphy, Wyatt Wear and Gabriel Mangione and Halle Tomlinson
events.description: An intimate evening of improvised jazz grooves and soulful vocals featuring JJ Murphy Trio and Denver's Halle Tomlinson.

events.title: The Mike Dillon Band feat. Brian Haas w/ PHOTON
events.description: A night of Funk Punk Jazz Fusion with The Mike Dillon Band and Photon

events.title: Cousin Curtiss: High-Voltage Blues & Roots Rock Explosion
events.description: Raw, soulful powerhouse duo ignites blues, roots rock & Americana. Think Mumford meets AC/DC. Don't miss this two-man sonic explosion!

events.title: Dave Abear's A Very Jerry Band w/ Foggy Mountain Spaceship
events.description: A journey of music inspired by the Grateful Dead woven with original music by some of Colorado's best musicians!

events.title: Jeremy Mohney & his Orchestra - New Big Band Classics + Lindy Hop Lessons
events.description: Celebrate one year of Colorado's hottest swing orchestra with an unforgettable night of jazz classics and original compositions!

events.title: Back to the 2000s: Nostalgic Dance Party Fundraiser
events.description: Dance to 2000s hits while supporting young musicians through TEMPO. Every ticket helps the next generation of artists shine.

events.title: Tim Cook &  Godson - An Intimate Soul & Roots Evening
events.description: Subdudes bassist Tim Cook + Godson Seth Strickland of Green Buddha perform intimate originals & classics.

events.title: Roots & Soul: An Evening with Hazel Miller & Jack Hadley
events.description: Colorado music legends, Hazel Miller and Jack Hadley join forces for a special evening of soul, heart, laughter and song.

events.title: Face Vocal Band: A Valentine's Night of Harmony & Heart
events.description: Celebrate love in all forms with Face Vocal Band's stunning harmonies, heartfelt ballads & infectious energy. Valentine's magic awaits!

events.title: Stephen Kellogg and The Homecoming w/special guest gutter sinatra (Night 1)
events.description: "Two incredible songwriters bring nostalgia & heart to the stage. An unforgettable evening of soulful music & storytelling awaits!"

events.title: Stephen Kellogg and The Homecoming w/special guest gutter sinatra (Night 2)
events.description: "Two incredible songwriters bring nostalgia & heart to the stage. An unforgettable evening of soulful music & storytelling awaits!"

events.title: Resonance & Ritual featuring Tim Snider & Kayla Diana
events.description: Step into an evening where sound becomes medicine and rhythm becomes ritual.

events.title: Global Bass Gathering w/ Mah Ze Tar, Peace Sine, Bloomurian and DROS
events.description: ✨ Step into a World Bass Ritual where ancient tones meet future frequencies.
